mapper.select: select * from CLASS ORDER BY OPEN_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLASS (ID, NAME, LARGE_CATEGORY, SMALL_CATEGORY, CITY, ADDRESS, MAX_MEMBER, OWNER_ID, OPEN_DATE, DETAIL_CONTENTS, PHOTO_PATH) VALUES (#{id},#{name},#{large_category},#{small_category},#{city},#{address},#{max_member},#{owner_id},#{open_date},#{detail_contents},#{photo_path});
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASS AS CLS INNER JOIN CLASS_JOIN AS CLJ ON CLS.ID = CLJ.CLASS_ID
